\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0ff8cbcdaa74bf811c9d6c11d98b136b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={153}
B(z) = \frac{1}{1-2z}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1115e702e0237b316fbda63a111a29e5]%mdk
$B_{\leq 2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[71976219fb1234a4f2ba6bef7a046183]%mdk
$\bullet$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[76100419ded65de5176c361a72d8235b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={162}
B_{\leq2} = \emptyset + \circ\times \cdot B_{\leq2} + \bullet\circ \cdot B_{\leq2} 
+\bullet\bullet\circ \cdot B_{\leq2}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={165}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[59e23d24b1c0fc680c52b781f7c52136]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={167}
B_{\leq2}(z) = 1 + z\cdot B_{\leq 2}(z) + z^2\cdot B_{\leq 2}(z)+z^3 B_{\leq2}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={169}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[03b813d449780dc7000064dd40b5bf64]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={171}
B_{\leq2}(z)  = \frac{1}{1 - z - z^2 - z^3}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[79cb4a2c6de0786af0273a19f0234091]%mdk
$B_{\leq2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[79cb4a2c6de0786af0273a19f0234091]%mdk
$B_{\leq2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={176}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[71976219fb1234a4f2ba6bef7a046183]%mdk
$\bullet$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={193}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0f5695a0c392b0bcdebbee6d6e48b350]%mdk
$A = \{a\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={193}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e31c10af4905b6559cccc31dfc787d29]%mdk
$|a|=k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={193}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[15af214fd464bd95c3425b8abb68159e]%mdk
$B=SEQ(A)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={193}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2cc085062a5d5fdd1b53de2a587a4fce]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={195}
B(z) = \frac{1}{1-z^k}=1+z^k+z^{2k}+z^{3k}\cdots
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={197}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[04ee590a0ebdb0df132fd60f8888cffe]%mdk
$D(z)=\frac{1}{1-z^{10}}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={198}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2e6e301c4cec00c0d0a1ae25194b04dd]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={199}
\begin{aligned} 
C(z)&=\frac{1}{1-z}\frac{1}{1-z^5}\frac{1}{1-z^{10}}\frac{1}{1-z^{25}}
    =\frac{1}{(1-z)(1-z^5)(1-z^{10})(1-z^{25})}\\
    &=(1+z+z^2+\cdots)(1 + z^5 + z^{10} + \cdots)(1 + z^{10}+z^{20}+\cdots)(
      1+z^{25}+z^{50} + \cdots)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={206}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d01a6119f94a8fdc0d5bd229fb83ae2e]%mdk
$[z^{100}]C(z)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={220}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4f0d9575040ca422b5e8cbe53b91dbf9]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={222}
  B(z) = A(z)\cdot \dfrac{1}{1-z^m},
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={224}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a6fb95e866a04275d0946577fb57b4f0]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={226}
  B(z) - B(z)\cdot z^m = A(z).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={228}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7d7737db137d60eac1826bc867b6ca39]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={230}
  A_n = B_n - B_{n-m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={232}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0b5732306bd8a0333d448333e4c33593]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={234}
  B_n = A_n + B_{n - m}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={236}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f93809ae14fb28ef6dbe11c99529c51b]%mdk
$A_n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={236}

\[%mdk-data-line={246}
  B_{5 n} = A_{5 n} + B_{5 n-5} = A_{5\cdot n} + B_{5 (n-1)},
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
